HediffDef.label: storing bendalloy
HediffDef.description: This pawn is storing their Investiture in a nicrosil metalmind. Their spiritual connection weakens, reducing their ability to use magical or investiture-based abilities. The power they sacrifice now is preserved for future use — but for now, they feel hollow.

HediffDef.label: tapping bendalloy
HediffDef.description: This pawn is tapping a nicrosil metalmind, enhancing their spiritual potential. Investiture flows through them more freely, amplifying their magical abilities and allowing for prolonged or more potent effects. They burn brighter — but it drains quickly.
